pkgmetadata.longdescription: Summarize Daily Physical Activity from 'activPAL' Accelerometer Data // Summarize physical activity (Mets, Proportion, Total, etc.) in the given time period from accelerometer data. This package has been tested by data exported from 'activPAL'. 'activPAL' is a wearable device for medical and healthcare research application developed by PAL Technologies, Glasgow, Scotland. A simulated accelerometer sample dataset is provided in this package. See https://github.com/YukunZhang/PAactivPAL for more information.
